location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Joseph West Ridgeway to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding an accident that Pelly had, his thoughts on Aboo [Ä€bu], the business with Frederick Laing Mackeson and who might get his appointment, and giving news of friends and colleagues including John Underwood Champain and Albert James Leppoc Cappel who are off to Vienna to attend a telegraph conference, Evelyn Baring who is off on leave, and giving the movements of the Viceroy from October onwards.
